name: Сounterfeiters
description:
Have you ever tried to check if it's real or fake.In this game you will have this opportunity.

You live in a country called Hasla. Due to the poverty of neighboring countries, many people began to counterfeit money. You were hired to check the banknotes for authenticity

Control:

Mouse or touch screen only

Used programs:

  • Unity
  • Aseprite
  • Bosca seoil
  • BFXR

Used fonts:

Lambda regular by GGBotNet
